query:
SELECT
            flow_step_id,
            (flow_status->'step')::integer as step,
            jsonb_array_length(flow_status->'modules') as len,
            runnable_path ~ '/branchone-\d+$' as is_branch_one,
            parent_job as next_parent
        FROM v2_job
            LEFT JOIN v2_job_status USING (id)
        WHERE v2_job.id = $1
